meta.title: Nav
meta.description: Navigation components that share general markup and styles, from the base <b-nav> class to the active and disabled states. Swap modifier props to switch between each style.

slots.name: button-content
slots.description: Can be used to implement custom text with icons and more styling.

slots.name: default
slots.description: Optionally scoped default slot for dropdown menu content.

scope.description: Can be used to close the dropdown menu. Accepts an optional boolean argument, which if true returns focus to the toggle button.

events.description: Emitted just before dropdown is shown. Cancelable.

args.description: BvEvent object. Call bvEvt.preventDefault() to cancel show.

events.description: Emitted just before dropdown is hidden. Cancelable.

args.description: BvEvent object. Call bvEvt.preventDefault() to cancel hide.

events.description: Emitted when toggle button is clicked.
